title: #HwNetworkAgent.v1_0_0.HwNetworkAgent

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

Device_discover_enable.description: Indicates whether the network agent service is enabled.
Device_discover_enable.longDescription: If the network agent service is enabled, the devices that have the same gateway configuration in the cabinet can be managed. Otherwise, the service is unavailable.

DiscoveredDevicesCount.longDescription: Total number of devices discovered using SSDP.

NetworkInfoOfDevices.description: List of IP address information of the discovered devices.
NetworkInfoOfDevices.longDescription: List of IP address information of discovered devices, including the server SNs, IPv4 addresses, and IPv6 addresses.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

HwNetworkAgent.description: The network agent resource allows users to query and set the network information about the devices.
HwNetworkAgent.longDescription: The network agent resource allows users to query and set the network information about devices. Users can query the serial number and IP addresses of discovered devices and set IP addresses for the devices of specified serial number.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

SerialNumber.description: Serial number of the devices discovered.
SerialNumber.longDescription: Serial number of the devices discovered.

IPv4Address.description: IPv4 addresses of the devices discovered.
IPv4Address.longDescription: IPv4 addresses of the devices discovered.

IPv6Address.description: IPv6 addresses of the devices discovered.
IPv6Address.longDescription: IPv6 addresses of the devices discovered.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

SetDeviceIPInfo.description: IP address set by the agent for the device of the specified serial number.
SetDeviceIPInfo.longDescription: IP address set by the agent for the device of the specified serial number. Set either the IPv4 or IPv6 address information.
